snippet.title: Night of the Slayers | Official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
#coop #horrorgaming #steam 
Night of the Slayers , a brand new asymmetric horror action game with a 5vs2 format
Add to Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2549040/Night_of_the_Slayers/


Night of the Slayers™ is a 5v2 PvP, semi-open world, first person survival co-op horror game. In this unique production where hunters can effectively collaborate just like the survivors. Escape with your friends without becoming prey or scour the town with your pickup, and hunt the survivors.

For more Information, visit;
Discord: https://discord.gg/5nXz6NQAf6
Official Twitter : https://twitter.com/vicemask
Web-Site : https://www.vicemask.com

#Nightoftheslayers #multiplayer #multiplayergames  #videogames  #videogame    #coop #asymmetric #horrorgaming  #survivor #indiegame  #gamedevelopment
